LanguageData.RWBY_Aura.degreeDatas.0.label: Aura
LanguageData.RWBY_Aura.degreeDatas.0.description: Aura是自身的靈魂具現.只要是擁有靈魂的人都可以使用的能力,想自如使用需要大量練習.{PAWN_nameDef}已解鎖{PAWN_possessive}Aura.{PAWN_pronoun}能夠釋放{PAWN_possessive}的防禦力場,甚至以某種方式增加{PAWN_possessive}自身能力.\n\n{PAWN_nameDef}的Aura能自療{PAWN_objective}自己以及{PAWN_nameDef}脫離戰鬥便能自動回復.如果{PAWN_nameDef}受傷時.耗盡了{PAWN_possessive}Aura,恢復速度就會變慢.
LanguageData.Semblance_Ruby.degreeDatas.0.label: Semblance Ruby
LanguageData.Semblance_Ruby.degreeDatas.0.description: {PAWN_nameDef}的外像力能讓{PAWN_objective}以消耗Aura為代價,往任何{PAWN_pronoun}所選擇的方向以超乎尋常的速度衝刺,由於速度實在是太快了,常會讓人誤以為 {PAWN_pronoun}在瞬間移動.
LanguageData.Semblance_Yang.degreeDatas.0.label: Semblance Yang
LanguageData.Semblance_Yang.degreeDatas.0.description: {PAWN_nameDef}'s Semblance lets {PAWN_objective} take the energy from every blow {PAWN_pronoun} takes and use it to get more powerful. This seems to be a form of kinetic energy absorption, with {PAWN_nameDef} subsequently redirecting said energy against {PAWN_possessive} opponent.
LanguageData.Semblance_Weiss.degreeDatas.0.label: Semblance Weiss
LanguageData.Semblance_Weiss.degreeDatas.0.descriptio: {PAWN_nameDef}的外像力讓{PAWN_objective}能創造多功能的符文,{PAWN_nameDef}也能召喚出以{PAWN_pronoun}打敗過的對手為外型的僕從.
LanguageData.Semblance_Blake.degreeDatas.0.label: Semblance Blake
LanguageData.Semblance_Blake.degreeDatas.0.descriptio: {PAWN_nameDef}的外像力讓{PAWN_objective}能夠創造出影子替身,{PAWN_nameDef}能運用這些替身分散敵人注意、替{PAWN_objective}自身擋刀或短暫地躲避敵方.
LanguageData.Semblance_Nora.degreeDatas.0.label: Semblance Nora
LanguageData.Semblance_Nora.degreeDatas.0.description: {PAWN_nameDef}的外像力是能夠製造和引導電能流入{PAWN_possessive}肌肉,讓{PAWN_objective}強化肌力,電流耗損轉化為{PAWN_nameDef}的Aura.
LanguageData.Semblance_Jaune.degreeDatas.0.label: Semblance Jaune
LanguageData.Semblance_Jaune.degreeDatas.0.descriptio: {PAWN_nameDef}的外像力是能夠強化某些人的Aura,{PAWN_pronoun}也能用自己的Aura來強化{PAWN_possessive}防禦力.
LanguageData.Semblance_Pyrrha.degreeDatas.0.label: Semblance Pyrrha
LanguageData.Semblance_Pyrrha.degreeDatas.0.descripti: {PAWN_nameDef}能用{PAWN_possessive}外像力控制磁力,並且清楚明瞭磁力的效果,在大多數的戰鬥場合,{PAWN_nameDef}不會讓{PAWN_possessive}外像力被輕易探查,相反地,{PAWN_pronoun}用外像力讓{PAWN_pronoun}自己的武器做出微小的移動,有時候針對對手的武器,影響戰鬥結果,這讓{PAWN_objective}成為眾人眼中無法戰勝的存在.
LanguageData.Semblance_Ren.degreeDatas.0.label: Semblance Ren
LanguageData.Semblance_Ren.degreeDatas.0.description: {PAWN_nameDef}的外像力能遮蔽負面情緒,幫助{PAWN_objective}躲避戮獸的偵查,{PAWN_possessive}外像力也能用在其他人身上.
LanguageData.Semblance_Qrow.degreeDatas.0.label: Semblance Qrow
LanguageData.Semblance_Qrow.degreeDatas.0.description: {PAWN_nameDef}的外像力如影隨形地為{PAWN_pronoun}帶來厄運,與其他人的外像力不同的是,他的外像力幾乎時刻開啟且無法控制,{PAWN_nameDef}的衰運尤其與戮獸有關.
LanguageData.Semblance_Raven.degreeDatas.0.label: Semblance Raven
LanguageData.Semblance_Raven.degreeDatas.0.descriptio: {PAWN_nameDef}允許{PAWN_objective}創建傳送門,以便{PAWN_pronoun}能立即到摯友或愛人身旁,無距離限制能快速抵達對方身邊.
LanguageData.Semblance_Cinder.degreeDatas.0.label: Semblance Cinder
LanguageData.Semblance_Cinder.degreeDatas.0.descripti: {PAWN_nameDef}身懷遠高於其他使用者的高超技巧,{PAWN_pronoun}能夠直接使用塵晶原石並運用自如,{PAWN_possessive}絕招之一是強力的火塵晶箭,{PAWN_nameDef}還能從地面召喚出範圍性爆炸,並且Aura防禦上能輕易承受新月玫瑰的子彈.
LanguageData.Semblance_Hazel.degreeDatas.0.label: Semblance Hazel
LanguageData.Semblance_Hazel.degreeDatas.0.descriptio: {PAWN_nameDef}的外像力讓{PAWN_objective}弱化對疼痛的敏感度,使{PAWN_objective}忽視傷害和注入大量塵晶到{PAWN_possessive}身體,並且不會有立即性的負面效果,然而,雖然這項能力很棒,卻讓{PAWN_nameDef}降低察覺危險的能力.
LanguageData.Semblance_Velvet.degreeDatas.0.label: Semblance Velvet
LanguageData.Semblance_Velvet.degreeDatas.0.descripti: {PAWN_nameDef}'s Semblance is the ability to mimic the exact moves that other people have learned and used in combat to a degree. However, {PAWN_possessive} Semblance does not allow {PAWN_objective} to mimic the Semblances and capabilities of others and perform moves that are a direct result of another person's Semblance.
LanguageData.Semblance_Adam.degreeDatas.0.label: Semblance Adam
LanguageData.Semblance_Adam.degreeDatas.0.description: {PAWN_possessive}的外像力是月牙衝擊，能夠用{PAWN_possessive}近戰武器吸收或破解一位敵方的攻擊的能量，再以強力的紅色衝擊反射回去。
